summary: Glowing fins for the Nordic Arrows from Dragonborn.  Makes it easy to find them in the dark.
descriptionHtml:
Adds glowing fins to the Nordic Arrows from Dragonborn.

The fins (fletchings) glow a pale blue, making them a LOT easier to find in the dark. The stats of the arrows are not effected in any way (except that you can do a lot more damage with an arrow you haven\'t lost). The arrows in the quiver glow as well, but don\'t worry - enemies can\'t see them!  There are two versions, one with a glowing aura around the glowing fins, and one without.  Only fired arrow have the aura, the arrows in your quiver do not.  It\'s a matter of taste which version you prefer.

Sometimes, if you look at the aura \"out of the corner of your eye\", the aura may not quite line up with the fins of the arrow.  This is just the way the rendering engine works, don\'t worry about it.  It\'s not very noticeable.

INSTALLATION

Use NMM, it\'s so easy. If you\'re stubborn, just extract the zip, and drop the data folder into your Skyrim directory (or the meshes and textures folders into your data directory).

REMOVAL

Use NMM, it\'s so easy.  If not, just delete the meshes.

SIMILAR

I\'ve done several similar mods:
Daedric Arrows: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42792/?
Nordic Arrows from Dragonborn: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43433/?
Dragonbone Arrows from Dawnguard: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43497/?
Nordic Dragonbone Arrows from AeonVita\'s Dragonbone Weapons mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43087/?
